summary: Fixed from_dict() logic defect where falsy values (0, False) were incorrectly converted to empty strings
risks: None - fix is minimal and focused on the specific issue
Existing behavior for missing/None timestamp values is preserved via __post_init__ auto-generation
acceptance_criteria_met: created_at=0 is now converted to '0' instead of ''
created_at=False is now converted to 'False' instead of ''
updated_at=0 is now converted to '0' instead of ''
updated_at=False is now converted to 'False' instead of ''
Missing keys still auto-generate timestamps (existing behavior)
None values still auto-generate timestamps (existing behavior)
